lead_paragraph: Hashish from Morocco was once smuggled to Europe a speedboat at a time. But the trafficking has escalated to huge cargo ships, on a route including a chaotic stretch of Libya.

byline.original: By RUKMINI CALLIMACHI and LORENZO TONDO

headline.print_headline: Scaling Up a Drug Trade, Right Through ISIS Turf
headline.main: Scaling Up a Drug Trade, Straight Through ISIS Turf

snippet: Hashish from Morocco was once smuggled to Europe a speedboat at a time. But the trafficking has escalated to huge cargo ships, on a route including a chaotic stretch of Libya....
abstract: Discovery of drug smuggling route that allowed huge amounts of hashish to flow from Morocco along coast of Northern Africa to Libya  on way to Europe has Italian authorities worried and scrambling for information; among questions raised is extent to which Islamic State may be profiting from trade.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
